name: 3d Platformer (impylukkarila)
description:
My proposed game modifications are a little silly. 

I have Maya, and have taken one introduction to animation class in community college, although my texturing skills are nonexistent, so I think I'll create or swap out some small 3D environmental props. 

I want to swap out the 3d Particle system for the jump effect for something more cutesy than smoke, perhaps little stars and moons with a sparkle sound effect for fun. 

I was complaining about the camera movement before I finished the tutorial and we going to fixing the camera's settings, and he suggested I just create the game where the camera is in a fixed odd position, and to set up my level around that constraint. I like that challenge., and feel that is a very fun idea. 

I'll see what I can do with one week of time, but I'll attempt to execute these all.
